projects.name: Portfolio Website
description: Developed this personal portfolio website to showcase my Skills, Experience, Educational Background, Projects and Hobbies with an interactive, visually appealing and mobile-friendly responsive UI using React, SCSS.

projects.name: Ride Sharing Website
description: Designed PrimeRide, a ride-sharing platform where users can offer or join rides across cities using Flask, SQLite with security features like login, email authentication, phone verification via OTP, and passwords encrypted using bcrypt.

Implemented advanced features like Google Maps integration for route selection, rides history, and real-time email notifications for ride updates ensuring a seamless user experience including an engaging UI using Jinja templates and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Application Platform for Tensorflow & IoT Edge Applications
description: Designed an application platform to deploy and run tensorflow edge applications with advanced features like Scalability, Load Balancing, Real-time data streaming, Fault Tolerance, Reliability etc.,

Using Microservices Architecture, many services including Deployment Manager, Docker Manager, Scheduler, Logger, Monitor, etc., were implemented. All of the services communicate with one another using RabbitMQ message queues.

Created a simple UI that facilitates users to deploy their edge application following a predefined structure with XML style configuration. Dockers are used to contain the deployed services with dependencies and they are run in remote machines.

projects.name: Automated Quiz Evaluation System
description: Developed an Automated Quiz Evaluation system using modules like Image Segmentation Module using CTPN algorithm in TensorFlow, OCR module employing Tesseract, Semantic Text Similarity Module (BERT).
Developed simple UI for students and instructors for submitting and evaluating question-answer pairs and distributed backend powered by Flask and Docker for scalable modules deployment.
